formula: a(n) = n 4^n |E_{2n-1}(1/2)+E_{2n-1}(1)| for n > 0; E_{n}(x) Euler polynomials. - _Peter Luschny_, Nov 25 2010a(n) = (2*n)! * [x^(2*n)] tan(x)*x.a(n) = 2*(2*n)!*Pi^(-2*n)*(4^n-1)*Li{2*n}(1) for n > 0. - _Peter Luschny_, Jun 29 2012E.g.f.: sqrt(x)*tan(sqrt(x))= sum(n>=0,  a(n)*x^n/(2*n)! ) = x/T(0) where T(k)= 1 - 4*k^2 + x*(1 - 4*k^2)/T(k+1) ; (continued fraction, 1-step). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Sep 19 2012E.g.f.: -1 - x^(1/2)- Q(0),where Q(k) = 4*k -1 - x/( 1 - x/ (4*k+1 + x/( 1 + x/Q(k+1) ))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Nov 24 2013
